description: Certified models meet all ENERGY STAR requirements as listed in the Version 2.3 ENERGY STAR Program Requirements for Roof Products that are effective as of July 1, 2012 or the Version 3.0 ENERGY STAR Program Requirements for Roof Products that are effective as of July 1, 2017 . A detailed listing of key efficiency criteria are available at http://www.energystar.gov/index.cfm?c=roof_prods.pr_crit_roof_products

name: ENERGY STAR Certified Roof Products
